source.7d266704: The plot above shows the number of suicides for both males and females of different age groups for every year from 1985 to 2016
source.3e464d3b: The plot above shows the numbers of suicides commited by the people of different generations across both the genders. Here, we can see that suicide numbers are higher in the generation of Boomers, whereas it is lowest in Generation Z.

source.d99a3562: The plot above shows the numbers of suicides commited by the people of different age groups across both the genders. We can observe that the suicide rate is higher in the age group of 35-54 years in both female and male populations and it is lowest in age group of 5-14 years.
